title: Recall drops on custom dataset
body:
Hi, thank you for your excellent repo!

I am having an issue, which is possibly connected with my custom dataset only, so yo do not need to bother with it and may close the issue right away.
On the other hand may be you already encountered something similar and could give me an advice how to deal with it.

I trained my custom dataset for 500 epochs and was quite happy with it so I decided to train it again, but for 3000 epochs this time. However the intermediate training results are not satisfying at all - while the Precision values are OK and in line with expectations, in Recall I see sudden drops. See the plot.
Do you have an idea what may be causing it?

The only other parameter I changed , besides number of epochs, was batch size and accumulate -- see the commands used below.

`python3 train.py --data data/custom_dataset/custom_dataset.data --weights weights/yolov3-spp.weights --img-size 608 --cfg cfg/yolov3-spp-1cls.cfg --batch-size 4 --accumulate 1 --epochs 3000 --single-cls --cache-images --name custom_dataset_3000 --device 0`

`python3 train.py --data data/custom_dataset/custom_dataset.data --weights weights/yolov3-spp.weights --img-size 608 --cfg cfg/yolov3-spp-1cls.cfg --batch-size 2 --accumulate 8 --epochs 500 --single-cls --cache-images --name custom_dataset_500 --device 0`

![results](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62949809/80105595-19496980-8579-11ea-81db-0adf376b3ca0.png)
